May 1, 2025 - Owens Corning is an American company that develops and produces insulation, roofing, and fiberglass composites and related products. It is the world's largest manufacturer of fiberglass composites. It was formed in 1935 as a partnership between two major American glassworks, Corning Glass Works ...

t: Owens Corning Company Profile - Owens Corning Overview - GlobalData
s: Owens Corning is a manufacturer of composite and building materials systems. The company produces and sells fiberglass composites. Its product portfolio includes thermal and acoustical batts, foam sheathing, loose-fill insulation, and accessories.
